Lung

Lung Anatomy: total of 19 bronchopulmonary segments. Number of segments removed surgically is directly proportional to post-operative pulmonary function.

Functions:

- Gas exchange

- Acid-base homeostasis

- Filtration of blood

- Endocrine (converts angiotensin-1 to angiotensin-2; removes endothelin-1, serotonin, bradykinin, Prostaglandin-F2 Î± ).
